backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining user profiles, catalog types, carts, orders, returns, analytics, and admin/user operations with storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping admin product‑management improvements to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing one‑sentence summaries for various frontend components, hooks, pages, and static assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base variables and light/dark theme tokens for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/public/llms.txt: Static metadata file describing the storefront business, structure, features, and technical details for LLMs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React router, layout, routes, and providers for the storefront and admin areas.
frontend/src/components/admin/InventoryE: Dialog component allowing admins to update a product’s inventory with validation and API calls.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Form dialog for creating or editing products with validation, unsaved‑changes protection, and backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin-only routes by checking user role and showing loading or access denied states.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout button with Internet Identity handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts newly authenticated users without profiles to enter their name and saves it.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartLineIte: Displays a cart item with image, price, quantity selector, subtotal, and remove button.
frontend/src/components/catalog/FiltersP: Renders category, brand, price, and availability filters based on product data.
frontend/src/components/catalog/ProductC: Shows a product card with image, brand, name, price, and out-of-stock badge.
frontend/src/components/catalog/SortMenu: Dropdown to select product sort order such as relevance, price, or name.
frontend/src/components/compliance/Cooki: Banner prompting users to accept or decline cookies with actions hooked to consent state.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays site footer with navigation links, legal info, cookie preferences, and branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Main store layout with header, content outlet, footer, and cookie banner.
frontend/src/components/nav/StickyHeader: Sticky header with logo, search, navigation, account menu, admin link, and cart indicator.
frontend/src/components/orders/InitiateR: Form component that submits a return request with a text reason using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/orders/StatusTim: Displays an order's status history with labels and timestamps in a vertical timeline.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductG: Shows a product image with a zoomable modal viewer for larger display.
frontend/src/components/recommendations/: Fetches recommended products and renders up to four in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/search/HeaderSea: Implements a header search bar with debounced queries, dropdown results, and navigation on selection.
frontend/src/components/seo/ProductJsonL: Outputs JSON‑LD metadata for a product to improve search engine visibility.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminData.ts: Provides admin-focused queries and mutations for analytics, orders, returns, and product management.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useProfile.ts: Fetches and updates the authenticated user's profile using actor-based queries and mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useUserRole.ts: Retrieves the caller's user role or falls back to guest based on actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/cart/useCart.ts: Manages cart queries and mutations for authenticated and guest users, including localStorage handling.
frontend/src/hooks/catalog/useCatalog.ts: Supplies product, variant, and full catalog queries via actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/catalog/useCatalogFil: Builds catalog filters from URL params and returns filtered product lists with update helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/compliance/useCookieC: Handles cookie consent state, persistence in localStorage, and banner visibility controls.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useOrder.ts: Provides hooks to fetch a single order or full order history using the actor API with react-query.
Defines a mutation to place an order via the actor and invalidates cart and order queries afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/recommendations/useRe: Fetches product recommendations and provides a mutation to track product views, refreshing recommendations on update.
frontend/src/hooks/returns/useReturns.ts: Provides hooks to fetch return requests and initiate new returns, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/search/useSearch.ts: Runs product search via backend with a fuzzy-search fallback and caches results with react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/seo/usePageMeta.ts: Updates document title and meta description when page metadata changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identities, and identity lifecycle.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with theme variables, typography, focus styles, and custom scrollbars.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with react-query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/account/OrderDetailPa: Displays a specific order’s details with status, items, shipping data, and supports viewing or initiating return requests.
frontend/src/pages/account/OrdersPage.ts: Lists the user’s past orders with totals and statuses, providing links to detailed views.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing analytics such as order count, revenue, top products, and links to management sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders for admins with details and allows updating order status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Lists products with search, sorting, and editing tools, including dialogs for creating and updating products.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminReturnsPag: Shows return requests and lets admins approve, reject, or complete refunds.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart with item management, order summary, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows a product catalog with filters, sorting, hero banner, and product grid rendering.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout form that validates identity and cart contents, gathers contact and shipping info, and submits an order before navigating to the confirmation page.
frontend/src/pages/legal/PrivacyPolicyPa: Renders the site's privacy policy with sections on data collection, usage, security, and user rights.
frontend/src/pages/legal/RefundPolicyPag: Displays the refund policy including return conditions, process steps, and non‑returnable items.
frontend/src/pages/legal/TermsPage.tsx: Presents the terms of service describing user obligations, IP rights, and liability limits.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details including items, shipping info, status timeline, and navigation options after placing an order.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows product details, gallery, stock info, and allows adding items to the cart while tracking product views.
frontend/src/utils/search/fuzzy.ts: Implements edit‑distance and fuzzy matching functions for approximate text search.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read, persist, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s metadata, architecture, features, and overall state configuration.
